content: Whenever I run the student tester it makes me manully plug in the inputs. Should this happen or did I do something wrong?
subject: PSET 1 student tester

content:
This should not be happening. Without looking at your code, I can't say what's causing this, but my guess would be that you ran hangman outside the
if __name__ == "__main__" block
This is for pset 1, not pset 2
Sorry, my bad. Regardless, the tester should not be asking you to manually plug inputs into it.
Is it possible to look over my code and tell me if there’s something obviously wrong with it? Or should I come to office hours today?
I can look it over if you post it (make sure to create a private Piazza post), but OH are your best bet
I’ll post it here privately in case I can’t get to OH today. Thanks!
I see the problem. Can you move your inputs and variable declaration to the appropriate section? That should fix it
Oh wow, I really didn’t pay attention. Thank you!
If I resubmit now, do I use one late day?
Yes. This will count as one late day
